long_description: Like to lounge in your hammock even when the weather isn't cooperating? The easy-to-use ENO Hammock Indoor Hanging kit lets you create a relaxation station using any secure structure. Kit includes 2 anchor bolt hangers, 2 lag screws, 2 washers, 2 sections of 5mm-diameter cord and a detailed installation guide. Simply install the 2 anchor bolt hangers with the lag screws and washers to studs in your bedroom or basement and clip your hammock (sold separately) to the hangers. ENO Hammock Indoor Hanging kit has a weight capacity of 400 lbs.
